guides.name: Spotlight on Balboa Bay Resort
guides.description: Balboa Bay Resort is a bayfront resort in Newport Beach, California. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Beacon Grand
guides.description: Beacon Grand is one of San Francisco's most historic hotels and iconic social hubs, with a fresh, chic style. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Botania Relais & Spa
guides.description: Botania Relais & Spa is a 40-room under-the-radar gem on Ischia, Italy. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Cape Weligama
guides.description: Cape Weligama is a cliffside escape in Sri Lanka that takes the idea of a beach resort to the next level. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Carneros Resort and Spa
guides.description: Carneros Resort and Spa is a quintessential Napa Valley, California retreat featuring cozy private cottages, farm-to-table dining and onsite wine tastings. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Casa Angelina
guides.description: Casa Angelina is a contemporary 37-room retreat in Praiano, Italy on the Amalfi Coast. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Casa Majani
guides.description: Casa Majani is a fully staffed luxury villa in Punta Mita, Mexico. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Ceylon Tea Trails
guides.description: Ceylon Tea Trails is a collection of five luxury bungalows in Sri Lanka. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Chapter Roma
guides.description: Chapter Roma is a playful and artistic boutique hotel in Rome, Italy. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Château Voltaire
guides.description: Château Voltaire is a chic hideaway mere steps away from the Jardin des Tuileries in Paris, France. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Donna Carmela Resort & Lodges
guides.description: Donna Carmela Resort & Lodges is an intimate Sicily, Italy retreat with extensive gardens and a chic, homey feel. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Elizabeth Unique Hotel
guides.description: Elizabeth Unique Hotel is a five-star boutique hotel in Rome, Italy with an eye for art. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Faloria
guides.description: Faloria is a luxury alpine retreat in the Dolomites, Italy that's both family- and pet-friendly. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Flemings Mayfair Hotel
guides.description: Flemings Mayfair Hotel is an iconic London hotel with glamorous 1930s sensibilities and a Michelin-Starred restaurant. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Hotel AMANO Covent Garden
guides.description: Hotel AMANO Covent Garden is a lively and modern home base in the center of London's West End. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Hotel De’ Ricci
guides.description: Hotel De’ Ricci is an elegant and intimate haven in Rome, Italy for wine lovers. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Hotel Valley Ho
guides.description: Hotel Valley Ho is a colorful, mid-century modern icon in downtown Scottsdale, Arizona. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Ko’a Kea Resort
guides.description: Ko’a Kea Resort is a boutique resort in Kauai, Hawaii that is ideal for travelers seeking romance and seclusion. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on La Cocumella
guides.description: La Cocumella is the oldest hotel in Italy on the Sorrento peninsula, with a famous history and quiet, Mediterranean-inspired charm.

guides.name: Spotlight on Le Manoir de Lorient
guides.description: Le Manoir de Lorient is a stylish seven-bedroom villa in St. Barths. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Lupaia
guides.description: Lupaia is a hillside retreat with panoramic views of Tuscany, Italy. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Lyle Washington, DC
guides.description: The Lyle Washington, DC is a soothing oasis housed in a revamped Art-Deco apartment building.

guides.name: Spotlight on ModernHaus SoHo
guides.description: ModernHaus SoHo is a modernist downtown New York City escape with a playful spirit and an eye for great art. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on One Hundred Shoreditch
guides.description: One Hundred Shoreditch is a hip neighborhood hotel in London's artsy East End. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Ned NoMad
guides.description: The Ned NoMad is a chic Manhattan escape and private members' club with a world-class art program. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Palazzo Ripetta
guides.description: Palazzo Ripetta is an elegantly redesigned conservatory in the historic center of Rome, Italy. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Palazzo Vecchietti
guides.description: Palazzo Vecchietti combines boutique luxury and historical charm in a restored 16th-century palace. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Raya Heritage Chiang Mai
guides.description: Raya Heritage Chiang Mai is a riverside escape offering authentic experiences in Chiang Mai, Thailand. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Rayavadee
guides.description: Rayavadee is a dreamy resort on Thailand's Phranang Peninsula. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Rivoli Boutique Hotel
guides.description: Rivoli Boutique Hotel is a welcoming, family-owned boutique hotel in Florence, Italy. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Hôtel L’Eldorado Paris
guides.description: Hôtel L’Eldorado Paris is an urban Parisian retreat with a secret garden in the quaint Batignolles quartier.

guides.name: Spotlight on Sunset Tower Hotel
guides.description: Sunset Tower Hotel is a glamorous West Hollywood icon that honors its history while embracing LA's contemporary cool. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Charleston Place
guides.description: Charleston Place is an elegant stay in the southern city's thriving historic center. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Dewberry
guides.description: The Dewberry is a meticulously designed boutique gem in Charleston, South Carolina.  It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Frederick Hotel
guides.description: The Frederick is one of NYC's oldest-running hotels. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Hoxton, Amsterdam & The Hoxton, Lloyd Amsterdam
guides.description: Two trendy and comfortable Amsterdam hotels that take design inspiration from their historic buildings. They are members of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Place Firenze
guides.description: The Place Firenze is a 20-room boutique hotel overlooking Florence's historic Piazza Santa Maria Novella. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Prince Akatoki London
guides.description: Refined Japanese aesthetic meets London chic at this Fora Reserve property in London.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Watergate Hotel
guides.description: A Washington, DC icon with modern luxury appeal. It is a Fora Reserve member.

guides.name: Spotlight on Therasia Resort
guides.description: Therasia Resort is a 60-room wellness hideaway on Vulcano, in the Aeolian Islands in Italy.  It is a Fora Reserve member.

guides.name: Spotlight on Turtle Bay Resort
guides.description: Turtle Bay Resort is the only luxury resort on Oahu's stunning North Shore. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on URSO Hotel & Spa
guides.description: URSO Hotel & Spa is a sophisticated neoclassical boutique hotel in central Madrid, Spain. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Wild Coast Tented Lodge
guides.description: Wild Coast Tented Lodge has luxurious cocoon-like tents in the Sri Lankan jungle. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Lungarno Collection
guides.description: Lungarno Collection is a design-forward collection of luxury boutique hotels in Milan, Rome and Florence. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on NIZUC Resort & Spa
guides.description: NIZUC is luxe resort tucked away in a tranquil corner of Punta Nizuc between a lagoon and mangrove forest. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.name: Spotlight on Castello di Velona Resort, Thermal Spa & Winery
guides.description: Castello di Velona Resort, Thermal Spa & Winery is an 11th-century fortress overlooking Tuscany's Val d'Orcia. It is a member of Fora Reserve.

guides.description: The invitation-only preferred partner programs for Marriott's luxury and lifestyle brands, respectively.

guides.name: Preferred Program: Les Domaines de Fontenille
guides.description: Les Domaines de Fontenille’s magical hotels in France, Italy and Spain celebrate nature, heritage and slow food — in style. they are Fora Reserve members.

guides.name: Spotlight on Nômade
guides.description: Nômade's three boutique hotels in Mexico combine sustainable architecture and design, chic decor and a deep appreciation for holistic wellbeing. They are Fora Reserve members.

guides.name: Spotlight on Octant Hotels
guides.description: A collection of eight authentic Portuguese hotels in idyllic locales. They are Fora Reserve members.

guides.name: Spotlight on Alma Hotels
guides.description: Two Spanish hotels with a strong sense of place and an eye for architecture.

guides.description: As one of the first agency members of Omni Select, Fora grants travelers exclusive perks at Omni's hyper-local hotels and resorts across the US, from Scottsdale to Amelia Island.

guides.description: Palisociety hotels offer one-of-a-kind, neighborhood-centric travel experiences

guides.description: Family-owned boutique hotel company with properties in the United Kingdom. They are part of Fora Reserve.

guides.description: The collection’s program ensures Fora travelers get treated like the VIPs they are, with exclusive perks and benefits at select Relais & Châteaux hotels around the world.

guides.description: As members of COUTURE by Langham, Fora Advisors grant travelers access to exclusive perks and offers at this collection of properties around the world.

guides.name: Spotlight on The Mercer
guides.description: A sleek SoHo hideaway loved by savvy locals and travelers alike. You can unlock perks for your clients at this New York City property.

guides.name: Preferred Program: Virtuoso
guides.description: As a Virtuoso travel agency, Fora grants travelers access to perks at more than 2,000 hotels around the world, with 60+ brands like Aman, Ritz-Carlton and Mandarin Oriental.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: AmaWaterways
guides.description: Luxury river cruises offering locally sourced dining, wellness programs and active shore excursions.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: HX & Hurtigruten Expeditions
guides.description: The OG eco-friendly cruise line, and the first to introduce battery-hybrid ships and ban the use of heavy fuel oil.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Lindblad
guides.description: A 100% carbon-neutral pioneer in responsible travel that facilitates intimate, local experiences in remote destinations.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Regent Seven Seas
guides.description: A luxury all-inclusive cruise line where every room is a suite.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Royal Caribbean
guides.description: Royal Caribbean’s fleet of family-friendly cruises are more like floating resorts. They have something for everyone — from vibrant casinos to gigantic waterparks to med spas.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Silversea Cruises
guides.description: A luxury, intimate cruise line where everything is included, even butler service.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Viking Cruises
guides.description: An adults-only luxury cruise line for the culture-obsessed.

guides.name: Cruise Spotlight: Virgin Voyages
guides.description: A playful, adults-only cruise line designed to convert even the most cruise-averse.

guides.name: Crusie Spotlight: Crystal
guides.description: Luxury, immersive cruising for the sophisticated traveler.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Abercrombie & Kent
guides.description: Abercrombie & Kent tailors bucket-list-worthy adventures across all seven continents. From personalized trips to small-group journeys to expedition cruises and more, A&K’s portfolio of luxury vacations will dazzle any traveler.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Backroads
guides.description: Backroads combines physical activity, cultural immersion, intimate local connections, impeccable gastronomy and luxury accommodations.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: BLADE
guides.description: Efficient, stress-free air transportation alternatives for traveling in and around cities.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: HVN
guides.description: HVN is the go-to service for the ultimate vacation at luxury homes and villas around the world.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: J.MAK Hospitality
guides.description: J.MAK Hospitality boasts virtually every type of luxury travel experience . Thanks to Fora’s partnership, your clients access VIP perks.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Mint House
guides.description: Modern, apartment-style accommodations equipped for weekend getaways, longer sojourns and anything in-between.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Project Expedition
guides.description: Project Expedition curates unique tours, adventures and excursions to meaningfully immerse travelers in destinations around the world, from Cyprus to South Africa.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Tauck
guides.description: Tauck's escorted tours and intimate cruises help you experience the world more authentically.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: La Fonda Heritage Hotel
guides.description: La Fonda Heritage Hotel blends historic elegance and gourmet dining in Marbella's Old Town.

guides.name: Partner Spotlight: Viesca Toscana
